member.name: POWERBROADCAST_SETTING
member.summary: Sent with a power setting event and contains data about the specific change. For more information, see Registering for Power Events and Power Setting GUIDs.

member.name: POWERBROADCAST_SETTING.PowerSetting
member.summary: Indicates the power setting for which this notification is being delivered. For more info, see Power Setting GUIDs.

member.name: POWERBROADCAST_SETTING.DataLength
member.summary: The size in bytes of the data in the Data member.

member.name: POWERBROADCAST_SETTING.Data
member.summary: The new value of the power setting. The type and possible values for this member depend on PowerSettng.
